outputs.output_descr: The project is supporting the government of Nigeria, through the Bank of Industry, to expand access to renewable energy services accessible to MSMEs by facilitating renewable energy investments and increase finance options for renewable energy uptake

Acess to Renewable Energy Project: This poject is supporting State Governments to expand access to renewable energy services accessible to MSMEs by facilitating renewable energy investments and increase finance options for renewable energy uptake.
Develoment and Expansion of Value Chains in Agriculture through supporting facilities for inclusive markets.
Developing and Expanding Value Chains in Agriculture by strenghening facilities for inclusive markets.
The project aims to expand the base of private sector-based service providers targeting business and market development for Medium, Small and Micro Enterprises at the Federal level

An expanded base of private sector-based service providers targeting business and market development for Medium, Small and Micro Enterprises, particularly through inclusive finance and entrepreneurship training at the states level.

project_descr: To stimulate sustainable private sector led growth that benefits the poor in Nigeria
